high_descs: Walk to the wooden desk on the right.
Pick up the pencil to the left of the clear container on the desk.
Turn around, take a right and walk to the small wooden desk on the right.
Turn on the small lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pencil by the light of a small lamp.

high_descs: Turn around completely and walk forward to the desk.
Pick up the pencil from the desk.
Turn around completely and move to the right to the side table.
Use the pencil to turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Turn on a lamp with a pencil.

high_descs: Turn right and take a small step to your left then walk to the desk in front of you.
Pick up the pencil that's in front of you to the left of the clear bowl.
Take two steps left to face the desk on the left.
Turn on the light that's on the left desk near the alarm clocks.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a pencil by lamp light.
